casebody.data:
HOSPICE
v.
NCDHHS. No. 522P06-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 28, 2007. Susan M. Fradenburg, Allyson Jones Labban, Maureen D. Murray, Greensboro, for Hospice, et al. June S. Ferrell, Assistant Attorney General, for NCDHHS.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of August 2007 by Respondent Intervenor for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 28th day of August 2007."
